post:
SupremeBytes, LLC was founded in February of 2010 in Columbus, Ohio with one goal in mind: good service and support at a fair price. From day one, our focus has been to provide support from the bottom up, while creating a stable, secure and reliable infrastructure for our clients. All our hardware in Los Angeles is fully owned managed internally by our support team.

What is Included?
* Server locations: Los Angeles (quadranet), New Jersey (intserserv), and France (OVH)
* All of the virtual servers come with 100Mbps port speed. (Los Angeles free 1gbps upgrade!)
* The servers are unmanaged, and you should manage it by your self.
* All of the Servers include 1 IPv4, and you can order more if you need.

* Free IPv6 addresses available at request! (L.A. Only)

Use promo code pinecone for 20% off!
